spell_tooltip.description: Disarm the enemy, preventing the use of any weapons or shield for 5 sec.
Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud.
Feint decreases your damage taken by an additional 40% while stunned and its energy cost is reduced by 30%.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Movement speed increased by 15%.

Gouges the eyes of an enemy target, incapacitating for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.

Must be in front of your target.

Awards 1 combo point.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Enemies have 30% reduced damage and healing for 6 sec after Blind or Sap's effect on them ends.
Wound Poison can now stack 2 additional times.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Increases your Agility by 3%.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Your finishing moves deal 6% increased damage.
You have a 20% chance to partially evade any damage dealt to you, reducing the damage it deals by 20%.
Slice and Dice grants additional attack speed equal to 100% of your Haste.
Shadowstrike damage increased by 8%.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Haste increased by 3.0%.
You are healed for 30% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.

Shadow Dance supercharges 4 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 4 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 4 sec after Stealth breaks.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.
Your Stealth abilities allow you to see the flaws in enemies' defenses, causing your attacks to ignore 30% armor for 10 sec.

Backstab has 15% increased critical strike chance.

While behind your target, Backstab critical strikes grant Find Weakness for 10 sec.

Draws upon surrounding shadows to empower your weapons, causing your attacks to deal 20% additional damage as Shadow and causing your combo point generating abilities to generate double combo points for 16 sec.

Shuriken Storm has 15% increased critical strike chance.

Shuriken Storm critical strikes grant Find Weakness for 10 sec.
After entering Stealth, your next combo point generating ability generates full combo points.
Shadowstep's cooldown is reduced by 20%, and its maximum range is increased by 20%.
After using Vanish or Shadow Dance, your next Cheap Shot is free and ignores its cooldown.
Vanish grants you a shield for 6 sec, absorbing damage equal to 18% of your maximum health.
Gain 30 Energy over 3 sec when you enter Stealth or activate Shadow Dance.
Abilities deal 10% more damage while Stealth or Shadow Dance is active.
Secret Technique damage increased by 15%.
Your finishing moves generate 5 Energy per combo point spent.
Backstab and Shadowstrike have a 20% chance to create a Shadow Clone that repeats the attack for 50% of normal damage as Shadow.
Shadow Dance increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities by 10%.
Shadow Dance has 1 additional charge.
Eviscerate and Black Powder deal an additional 30% damage as Shadow while Find Weakness is active.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Shadow Clones deal 15% increased damage.

Cheap Shot creates a Shadow Clone to Shadowstrike the target for 50% of normal damage as Shadow.

Kidney Shot creates a Shadow Clone to Eviscerate the target for 50% of normal damage as Shadow.

Shadow Dance duration is increased by 150% of your Haste stat.

Current bonus duration: 0.20 sec
Your abilities deal 5% increased magic damage.
Shadow Clones deal 15% increased damage and your effects that have a chance to create them have 5% additional chance to occur.
Find Weakness causes your attacks to ignore an additional 20% armor.
Shadow damage increased by 8%.

Find Weakness increases the damage of finishing moves by 10%.

Shadow Dance increases the damage of finishing moves by 10%.

Shadow Blades increases the damage of finishing moves by 10%.
Shadow Dance increases all ability damage by 10%, and Shadowstrike and Shruiken Storm damage by an additional 10%.
After activating Shadow Dance, your next 2 attacks that generate combo points deal 35% increased damage.
While Shadow Dance is active, your Shadow Techniques triggers 40% more frequently, stores 1 additional combo point, and generates 2 additional Energy.
While Shadow Dance is active, each different attack that generates or spends combo points lashes out at the target, dealing 4,336 Shadow damage.
Shuriken Storm damage increased by 40%.
Auto-attacks against Marked targets deal an additional 195 Plague damage.
Damage dealt to targets other than your Marked target deals 5% Plague damage to your Marked target.
Critical strike damage bonus increased by 20%.
When you consume an application of Deathstalker's Mark, the damage of your next Backstab is increased by 50% or Shadowstrike increased by 25%.
Deathstalker's Mark damage increased by 25%.
After Shadow Blades expires, gain 30% increased Shadow damage for 30 sec.
Cloak of Shadows duration increased by 2 sec.
Each time you consume a stack of Deathstalker's Mark, reduce the cooldown of Shadowstep by 3 sec.

When you consume the final Deathstalker's Mark from a target or your target dies, gain 30 Energy and Darkest Night, causing your next Eviscerate cast with 5 or more combo points to critically strike, deal 50% additional damage, and apply 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to the target if no other Deathstalker's Mark is active.

Eviscerate cast with Darkest Night does not consume a stack of active Deathstalker's Marks.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Movement speed increased by 15%.

Gouges the eyes of an enemy target, incapacitating for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.

Must be in front of your target.

Awards 1 combo point.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Enemies have 30% reduced damage and healing for 6 sec after Blind or Sap's effect on them ends.
Wound Poison can now stack 2 additional times.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Increases your Agility by 3%.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
Crippling Poison reduces movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 25%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Your finishing moves deal 6% increased damage.
Reduces the duration of movement slowing effects 30%.
You have a 20% chance to partially evade any damage dealt to you, reducing the damage it deals by 20%.
Slice and Dice grants additional attack speed equal to 100% of your Haste.
Shadowstrike damage increased by 8%.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
You are healed for 30% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.

Shadow Dance supercharges 4 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 4 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 4 sec after Stealth breaks.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.
Your Stealth abilities allow you to see the flaws in enemies' defenses, causing your attacks to ignore 30% armor for 10 sec.

Backstab has 15% increased critical strike chance.

While behind your target, Backstab critical strikes grant Find Weakness for 10 sec.

Draws upon surrounding shadows to empower your weapons, causing your attacks to deal 20% additional damage as Shadow and causing your combo point generating abilities to generate double combo points for 16 sec.

Shuriken Storm critical strikes grant Find Weakness for 10 sec.
After entering Stealth, your next combo point generating ability generates full combo points.

After using Vanish or Shadow Dance, your next Cheap Shot is free and ignores its cooldown.

Eviscerate and Black Powder deal an additional 30% damage as Shadow while Find Weakness is active.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Cheap Shot creates a Shadow Clone to Shadowstrike the target for 50% of normal damage as Shadow.

Kidney Shot creates a Shadow Clone to Eviscerate the target for 50% of normal damage as Shadow.

Shadow Dance duration is increased by 150% of your Haste stat.

Current bonus duration: 0.20 sec
Your abilities deal 5% increased magic damage.
Shadow Clones deal 15% increased damage and your effects that have a chance to create them have 5% additional chance to occur.
Find Weakness causes your attacks to ignore an additional 20% armor.
Shadow damage increased by 8%.

Find Weakness increases the damage of finishing moves by 10%.

Shadow Dance increases the damage of finishing moves by 10%.

Shadow Blades increases the damage of finishing moves by 10%.
Shadow Dance increases all ability damage by 10%, and Shadowstrike and Shruiken Storm damage by an additional 10%.
After activating Shadow Dance, your next 2 attacks that generate combo points deal 35% increased damage.
While Shadow Dance is active, your Shadow Techniques triggers 40% more frequently, stores 1 additional combo point, and generates 2 additional Energy.
While Shadow Dance is active, each different attack that generates or spends combo points lashes out at the target, dealing 4,415 Shadow damage.

Shadowstrike applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to your target, unless Deathstalker's Mark is already active.

When you spend 5 or more combo points on attacks against a Marked target you consume an application of Deathstalker's Mark, dealing 2,160 Plague damage.
Shuriken Storm damage increased by 40%.
Auto-attacks against Marked targets deal an additional 195 Plague damage.
Damage dealt to targets other than your Marked target deals 5% Plague damage to your Marked target.
Critical strike damage bonus increased by 20%.
When you consume an application of Deathstalker's Mark, the damage of your next Backstab is increased by 50% or Shadowstrike increased by 25%.
Deathstalker's Mark damage increased by 25%.
After Shadow Blades expires, gain 30% increased Shadow damage for 30 sec.
Deathstalker's Mark has a 30% chance to immediately consume a stack when applied.

Evasion reduces magical damage taken by 15%. 

Cloak of Shadows reduces physical damage taken by 20%.

Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud.
After coming out of a stun, you deal 10% increased damage for 12 sec.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.

Energy cost of finishing moves reduced by 6%.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 3.6% Leech.
You are healed for 30% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.
Increases your maximum Energy by 100 and Energy regeneration by 10%.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 4 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 4 sec after Stealth breaks.

Restore 100 Energy.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.

Sinister Strike has a 30% chance to hit an additional time and grant Opportunity.

 Opportunity
Your next Pistol Shot costs 50% less Energy and deals 100% increased damage.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 75%, your maximum Energy by 50, and your attack speed by 20% for 15 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Blind by 25% and increases its range by 5 yds.
Between the Eyes increases your damage dealt by an additional 2%.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 16%.
After spending 15 combo points, if you spend no combo points for 4 sec, abilities affected by Restless Blades will cool down 200% faster for 5 sec or until you spend a combo point.
Between the Eyes and Pistol Shot have 10 yd increased range and deal 20% increased damage.
Your finishing moves deal 10% increased damage.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Your off-hand attacks and Pistol Shots have a 25% chance to generate 8 Energy.
Opportunity increases the damage of Pistol Shot by an additional 20%. Each charge of Opportunity consumed by Pistol Shot generates 1 combo point.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point spent to grant a combo point.
Activating Adrenaline Rush improves the result of your next Roll the Bones by one level.
Roll the Bones has a 20% increased chance of granting more powerful results.
Critical strikes with Between the Eyes deal 3.0 times normal damage.
Sinister Strike and Ambush deal 20% increased damage. They also generate 5 Energy when they grant you Opportunity.

Using Pistol Shot with Opportunity has a 30% chance to make your next Ambush usable without Stealth.

Chance to trigger this effect matches the chance for Sinister Strike to grant Opportunity.
Attacks that generate combo points deal 20% increased damage.
Generate full combo points when you gain Adrenaline Rush.
Your chance for Sinister Strike to strike twice and grant Opportunity is increased by 10%
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage by 3% and movement speed by 1% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10 times.
Adrenaline Rush magnifies your precision and power, increasing the damage your combo point generating abilities and finishers deal by 20%.
Your auto-attack critical strikes increase the damage and critical strike chance of your next Between the Eyes by 3%, stacking up to 20 times.
Dispatch deals 20% increased damage and costs 6 less Energy. This damage bonus is increased by 50% while your damage is enhanced by your Between the Eyes.

The bonuses granted by your Roll the Bones are stronger.

Bonuses to chance for Sinister Strike to strike twice are 5% greater.
Bonuses to Sinister Strike and Ambush damage are 5% greater.
Bonuses to Restless Blades cooldown reduction are 10% greater.
Jackpot's bonus to critical strike chance is 5% greater.
Ambush has a chance to grant Opportunity. Chance to trigger this effect is 80% of the chance for Sinister Strike to grant Opportunity.

Finishing move that unleashes a barrage of gunfire, striking random enemies within 8 yards for Physical damage. Number of strikes increased per combo point.

Restores 1 combo point every 0.49 sec.

   1 point  : 5,414 over 0.49 sec
   2 points: 8,121 over 0.98 sec
   3 points: 10,828 over 1.46 sec
   4 points: 13,535 over 1.95 sec
   5 points: 16,242 over 2.44 sec
   6 points: 18,949 over 2.93 sec
You have a 30% chance to absorb 10% of any damage taken.
Fatebound Coins flipped by Envenom are 33% more likely to match the same face as the last flip.
Critical strike chance increased by 3%.
Mutilate, Ambush, and Fan of Knives generate 1 additional combo point when they trigger Seal Fate.
Blade Flurry causes an additional 6% of attack damage dealt to be dealt to affected enemies.
After flipping a Fatebound Coin that ends a streak of 4 or more, flip another that matches the same face.
Dispatch and Between the Eyes deal 5% more damage when they consume 5 or more combo points.
Envenom has a 15% chance to flip 3 Fatebound Coins.
Flipping Heads increases damage by an additional 4%. Damage dealt by flipping Tails is increased by 12%.

Every 7 coin flips, keep a lucky coin that bends you towards your fate for 12 sec. Your Agility is increased by 4%, the damage and bonuses of Fatebound Coins are increased by 50%, and coin flips are 15% more likely to match the same face as the last flip.

Coin flips do not count toward finding a lucky coin while you have a lucky coin.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Movement speed increased by 15%.

Gouges the eyes of an enemy target, incapacitating for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.

Must be in front of your target.

Awards 1 combo point.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.
Enemies have 30% reduced damage and healing for 6 sec after Blind or Sap's effect on them ends.
Wound Poison can now stack 2 additional times.
Increases your Agility by 3%.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
Crippling Poison reduces movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Shroud of Concealment has 50% reduced cooldown.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Your finishing moves deal 6% increased damage.
You have a 20% chance to partially evade any damage dealt to you, reducing the damage it deals by 20%.
Slice and Dice grants additional attack speed equal to 100% of your Haste.
Shadowstrike damage increased by 8%.

Sinister Strike has a 30% chance to hit an additional time and grant Opportunity.

 Opportunity
Your next Pistol Shot costs 50% less Energy and deals 100% increased damage.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 75%, your maximum Energy by 50, and your attack speed by 20% for 15 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Grappling Hook by 15 sec.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 16%.
After spending 15 combo points, if you spend no combo points for 4 sec, abilities affected by Restless Blades will cool down 200% faster for 5 sec or until you spend a combo point.
Between the Eyes and Pistol Shot have 10 yd increased range and deal 20% increased damage.
Blade Flurry's initial damage is increased by 100% and generates 1 combo point per target struck, but its Energy cost is increased by 30.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Your off-hand attacks and Pistol Shots have a 25% chance to generate 8 Energy.
Opportunity increases the damage of Pistol Shot by an additional 20%. Each charge of Opportunity consumed by Pistol Shot generates 1 combo point.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point spent to grant a combo point.
Activating Adrenaline Rush improves the result of your next Roll the Bones by one level.
Critical strikes with Between the Eyes deal 3.0 times normal damage.
Versatility increased by 3%.

Using Pistol Shot with Opportunity has a 30% chance to make your next Ambush usable without Stealth.

Chance to trigger this effect matches the chance for Sinister Strike to grant Opportunity.
Generate full combo points when you gain Adrenaline Rush.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage by 3% and movement speed by 1% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10 times.
Your auto-attack critical strikes increase the damage and critical strike chance of your next Between the Eyes by 3%, stacking up to 20 times.
Dispatch deals 20% increased damage and costs 6 less Energy. This damage bonus is increased by 50% while your damage is enhanced by your Between the Eyes.

When you gain Opportunity, gain 2 additional charges. Max 6 charges.

Pistol Shot consumes 2 additional charges of Opportunity to fire 2 additional bullets. Additional shots deal 20% reduced damage.
Ambush has a chance to grant Opportunity. Chance to trigger this effect is 80% of the chance for Sinister Strike to grant Opportunity.

Finishing move that unleashes a barrage of gunfire, striking random enemies within 8 yards for Physical damage. Number of strikes increased per combo point.

Restores 1 combo point every 0.49 sec.

   1 point  : 5,385 over 0.49 sec
   2 points: 8,078 over 0.98 sec
   3 points: 10,771 over 1.46 sec
   4 points: 13,464 over 1.95 sec
   5 points: 16,157 over 2.44 sec
   6 points: 18,850 over 2.93 sec
The cooldown of Between the Eyes is reduced by 5 sec.
Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud.
Feint decreases your damage taken by an additional 40% while stunned and its energy cost is reduced by 30%.
Shiv also reduces the target's healing received by 30% for 8 sec.

Attack with your off-hand, dealing 572 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your Crippling Poison, reducing movement speed by 84% for 5 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Shiv's Energy cost is reduced by 20, its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec, and its range is increased by 3 yds.
Movement speed increased by 15%.

Gouges the eyes of an enemy target, incapacitating for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.

Must be in front of your target.

Increases your maximum Energy by 100 and Energy regeneration by 10%.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 4 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 4 sec after Stealth breaks.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy for 670 Nature damage over 12 sec. Subsequent poison applications will instantly deal 77 Nature damage.

Increases the application chance of your weapon poisons by 5%.
Increases maximum Energy by 50.
Kidney Shot and Rupture also apply Internal Bleeding, dealing up to 1,920 Bleed damage over 6 sec, based on combo points spent.

Critical strikes with attacks that generate combo points grant an additional combo point per critical strike.
Garrote lasts 6 sec longer.
Garrote and Rupture damage increased by 15%.

Carve a deathmark into an enemy, dealing 2,993 Bleed damage and restoring 80 Energy to you over 16 sec. Damage dealt to the target by your Garrote, Rupture, and Lethal Poisons is increased by 100%.

Each time you apply a Lethal Poison to the target, apply it twice.

Envenom or Kingsbane apply Caustic Spatter for 10 sec. Limit 1.

Caustic Spatter causes 15% of your Nature damage dealt to splash onto other nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Enemies silenced by Garrote deal 15% reduced damage for 5 sec.
Increases the damage of your weapon poisons by 40%.
All damage you deal is increased by 10% while Deathmark is active.
Your weapon poisons and Nature or Bleed damage over time abilities deal 2% increased damage to targets for each of your lethal poison or damage over time effects on them.
When you apply a Weapon Poison with a single-target attack, you have a 50% chance to strike a nearby enemy for 135 Physical damage and apply the same Weapon Poison to them.
Envenom has a 5% chance per combo point spent to smash a vial of poison at the target's location, creating a pool of acidic death that deals 1,398 Nature damage over 2 sec to all enemies within it.

You regain 3 Energy each time your Garrote or Rupture deal Bleed damage to a target affected by your weapon poisons. Energy gain is reduced for bleeds beyond the first.

If an enemy dies while afflicted by your Rupture, you regain energy based on its remaining duration.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, dealing 75 Nature damage and applying Amplifying Poison for 12 sec. Envenom can consume 10 stacks of Amplifying Poison to deal 35% increased damage. Max 20 stacks.

Release a powerful poison from your weapons and inject it into your target, dealing 1,576 Nature damage instantly and an additional 1,852 Nature damage over 14 sec. 

Each time you apply a Lethal Poison to a target affected by Kingsbane, Kingsbane damage increases by 20%, up to 1,000%.

Awards 1 combo point.

Cloak of Shadows reduces physical damage taken by 20%.

Eviscerate cast with Darkest Night does not consume a stack of active Deathstalker's Marks.

Coin flips do not count toward finding a lucky coin while you have a lucky coin.
